text: "Girlfriend" is a song written by Paul McCartney. It was originally recorded by his band Wings in 1978. Michael Jackson covered the song on his 1979 album Off the Wall. It was released in the UK as the album's fifth single. Category:1978 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:Paul McCartney songs
title: Girlfriend (Wings song)
